All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AboutThisApp
Represents a JFrame that displays information about the application.
App
This is the demo application for the OBJ2100 course!
ApplicationMenu
This is the class that defines the Menu bar at the top of the application.
DatabaseHelper
This is a database class that handles the database credentials and communicates with the database It is based on the example app DatabaseHandler, and then modified and worked on
DatabaseInterface
Implementation of the methods for establishing database connection
ExecuteSql
Represents a JFrame for executing SQL queries and displaying the result.
FileAccessSettings
This class defines the section where you can choose a folder for writing the customer list
ListAllProducts
 
listOfCustomers
 
ListOfficesFrame
This class creates a nrw Jframe that lists information about all offices in a table
MainContent
This is the main content in the gui.
MainWindow
Main window, based on the example app
ModifyEmployeeFrame
This is a class that handles update, create and deletion of employees.
OrderImportGUI
 
PanelMenu
This class defines the panel of buttons to the left of the gui
ReportsAndUpdates
The ReportsAndUpdates class represents a panel that displays various commands and actions related to reports and updates.
TestDatabaseFrame
